column5: Position and size of the printable area of the print cylinder in the coordinates of the Preview resource.
The width of one zone in the feed direction of the printing machine being used.
The number of ink zones of the press.
Number of ink zones in feed direction of the press.
The width of one zone of the printing machine being used. The width of a zone SHOULD be the width of an ink slide.
Device provides a reference to the press that the InkZoneProfile is defined for and MAY be used to gather information on ink zone geometry.
